title: How to Make Coffee Cookies

steps.headline: Pour in warm water into the instant coffee in a bowl.
Add the oil into the mixture.
Crack the 2 eggs and add them in the bowl.
Pour in the sugar and stir with a whisk.
Put the baking powder in the mixture, with the salt.
Roll the cookies into balls and flatten a bit.
Put the cookies on a pan.
Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes.
Place on a platter and serve.

text: Preheat your oven to 350°F.  Pour in warm water into the instant coffee in a bowl.  Add the oil into the mixture.  Crack the 2 eggs and add them in the bowl. Throw out the shells. Pour in the sugar and stir with a whisk.  Add in the flour.  Put the baking powder in the mixture, with the salt.  Mix together.  Roll the cookies into balls and flatten a bit.  Put the cookies on a pan.  Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes.  Place on a platter and serve.
